job_description:
• Minimum QualificationsBachelors/Master/PhD degree in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, Wireless Communications or equivalent majors is preferred.
• Strong Embedded Software Engineering skills including design, development (C, C++, Python) and debugging.
• Knowledge of wireless/internet standards, including but not limited to 3GPP 5G-NR and LTE Data protocols (SDAP/PDCP/RLC/MAC) and their applications in end to end product design is a plus.
